short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays the total price/cost of all awards a reddit post has received

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This chrome extension displays the total price/cost of all awards a reddit post has received in USD$

Only works for old.reddit.com links so far.
For support, message me at: https://twitter.com/DavoMyan
